reign.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the period when someone is in charge of an organization, team etc

reign.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a period during which something is the most powerful or most important feature of a place

reign.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to rule a nation or group of nations as their king, queen, or emperor

reign.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: if a feeling or quality reigns, it exists strongly for a period of time
